Getting started

An overview of Bootstrap, how to download and use, basic templates and examples, and more.

Usage (currently v0.0.4)

Source
Angular Scaffold
Pattern Library

From the CDN

Core

<!-- Latest compiled and minified CSS -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="//ui.edgecast.com/styles/0.0.4/css/core.min.css">

<!-- Latest compiled and minified JavaScript -->
<script src="//ui.edgecast.com/styles/0.0.4/js/core.min.js"></script>

Dependencies

<!-- Font Awesome -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="//ui.edgecast.com/libs/font-awesome/4.2.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" />

<!-- jQuery -->
<script src="//ui.edgecast.com/libs/jquery/1.11.1/jquery.min.js"></script>

Basic template

Start with this basic HTML template, or modify these examples. We hope you'll customize our templates and examples, adapting them to suit your needs.

Copy the HTML below to begin working with a minimal Bootstrap document.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>App Title</title>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="//ui.edgecast.com/libs/font-awesome/4.2.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" />
    <!-- Latest compiled and minified CSS -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="//ui.edgecast.com/styles/0.0.4/css/core.min.css">

  </head>
  <body>
    <header class="navbar navbar-default">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="navbar-header">
          <button class="navbar-toggle" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target=".navbar-collapse">
            <span class="sr-only">Toggle navigation</span>
            <span class="icon-bar"></span>
            <span class="icon-bar"></span>
            <span class="icon-bar"></span>
          </button>
          <a class="navbar-brand" href="">App Title</a>
        </div>
        <nav class="collapse navbar-collapse" role="navigation">
          <ul class="nav navbar-nav">
          </ul>
        </nav>
      </div>
    </header>
    <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12">
          <div class="page-header">
            <h5>
              <a href="#">
                Parent Scope
              </a>
            </h5>
            <div class="btn-group pull-right">
              <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">Optional</button>
              <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Actions</button>
            </div>
            <h2>
              Page Scope
              <br>
              <small>Optional scoped metadata or context</small>
            </h2>
          </div>
          <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-8">
              <h3>Main content here.</h3>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-4">
              <h4>Aside Content<br><small>Quick Forms / Contextual Help</small></h4>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <script src="//ui.edgecast.com/libs/jquery/1.11.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <!-- Latest compiled and minified JavaScript -->
    <script src="//ui.edgecast.com/styles/0.0.4/js/core.min.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

Examples

Build on the basic template above with Bootstrap's many components. See also Customizing Bootstrap for tips on maintaining your own Bootstrap variants.

Using the framework

Starter template

Nothing but the basics: compiled CSS and JavaScript along with a container.

Bootstrap theme

Load the optional Bootstrap theme for a visually enhanced experience.

Grids

Multiple examples of grid layouts with all four tiers, nesting, and more.

Jumbotron

Build around the jumbotron with a navbar and some basic grid columns.

Narrow jumbotron

Build a more custom page by narrowing the default container and jumbotron.

Navbars in action

Navbar

Super basic template that includes the navbar along with some additional content.

Static top navbar

Super basic template with a static top navbar along with some additional content.

Fixed navbar

Super basic template with a fixed top navbar along with some additional content.

Custom components

Cover

A one-page template for building simple and beautiful home pages.

Carousel

Customize the navbar and carousel, then add some new components.

Blog

Simple two-column blog layout with custom navigation, header, and type.

Dashboard

Basic structure for a admin dashboard with fixed sidebar and navbar.

Sign-in page

Custom form layout and design for a simple sign in form.

Justified nav

Create a custom navbar with justified links. Heads up! Not too WebKit friendly.

Sticky footer

Attach a footer to the bottom of the viewport when the content is shorter than it.

Sticky footer with navbar

Attach a footer to the bottom of the viewport with a fixed navbar at the top.

Experiments

Non-responsive Bootstrap

Easily disable the responsiveness of Bootstrap per our docs.

Offcanvas

Build a toggleable off-canvas navigation menu for use with Bootstrap.

Equal-height grid columns

Adds automatic equal-height grid columns to Bootstrap's grid system.
